Stranato made some odd thing that didn't resemble a weapon. He fired it at =
the ceiling, a spark flies out. Inzola laughs. Stranato shrugs. Inzola has =
finished hers and aims it at her HAND! She set it to 2 and fired. BANG! Her=
 hand exploded and components flew around the room. She winced from the pai=
n and set the gun on the table. Stranato didn't know what to say, he was st=
ill staring.

"Oh, sorry Stranato, I forgot, but that's the way they always=
 did that in my old army." Inzola says.

"They? They? THEY!!!??? Deemos was=
 beating you." Stranato said.

"What? No, I used to do this and..." Inzola =
is cut off.

"No! You were one of his troops! He beat on you just like the =
rest of them! Psuedo, and Bomb Time, and Land Mine!" Stranato yelled. He be=
at on the table with his fist and stood up. He started to leave.

"No! You =
can't leave, please, I don't want you to get hurt, Deemos might have anythi=
ng now, an army even, stay here with me, we'll take care of Deemos, we have=
 the Alliance! Stranato please trust me, i love you!" Inzola's last words m=
ade Stranato come back and sit back down at the table. He started to change=
 his weapon is silence, trying not to think of Deemos.

"Sorry, he was angr=
y." Inzola said to Reptilica and Bloody Strike. She worked on another weapo=
n with one hand...
